verbs.description: son of egypt former president [V: mohamed] [ARG1: morsi] arrested in cairo egyptian police have detanied the youngest son of ousted former president mohamed morsi from his home on the outskirts of cairo his family and security sources said abdullah morsi was taken into custody by security personnel for questioning on wednesday along with his i d and mobile phone his brother ahmed said adding he would be released later in the day two security sources said abdullah was arrested on charges of spreading false abdullah morsi egypt cairo president mohamed morsi president president abdul - fattah el - sisi
